employee_creation_api.description: Create a new employee for the admin's company
security_rules: Only users with ROLE_ADMIN can create employees
Admin can only create employees for their own company
The new employee will be automatically assigned to the admin's company
Admin cannot assign ROLE_ADMIN to new employees (defaults to ROLE_EMPLOYEE)

field_descriptions.userId: If provided, links employee to existing user account
field_descriptions.userName: Username for new user account (3-50 chars)
field_descriptions.email: Email for new user account (if not provided, auto-generated)
field_descriptions.password: Password for new user account (min 6 chars)
field_descriptions.roleName: Role for new user (defaults to ROLE_EMPLOYEE, cannot be ROLE_ADMIN)

create_employee_with_new_user.description: Create employee with new user account

create_employee_with_existing_user.description: Create employee linked to existing user

minimal_employee.description: Create employee with minimum required fields and new user
minimal_employee.notes: Email will be auto-generated as alice.johnson@{companyname}.com

403_access_denied.message: Access denied. Only admin users can create employees.

400_no_company.message: Your employee record is not associated with any company. Cannot create employees.

400_validation.message: Validation failed: First name is required

get_company_employees.description: Get all employees from admin's company
get_company_employees.security: Admin can only view employees from their own company

get_all_employees.description: Get all active employees (no company restrictions)

steps: 1. Admin user logs in to get JWT token
3. System validates admin role and company association
4. API allows employee creation for admin's company only

business_rules.company_isolation: Employees can only be created within admin's own company
business_rules.role_restrictions: New employees default to ROLE_EMPLOYEE role
business_rules.email_generation: If email not provided, auto-generated as firstname.lastname@{company}.com
business_rules.user_account: Can either link to existing user or create new user account
business_rules.audit_trail: createdByUserId tracks which admin created the employee
